title: Perform an Internal Audit
description: An internal auditor is starting an audit of a department's use of government-issued credit cards (P-cards).

tasks.description: Define the scope of the audit and select a random sample of P-card transactions to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor defines the audit scope and selects a sample of 50 transactions from the last quarter.

tasks.description: For each transaction in the sample, review the supporting documentation to ensure it was a valid business expense.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor reviews the receipts and justifications for all 50 transactions.

tasks.description: Document any findings or exceptions where policy was not followed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds two transactions that were missing proper receipts and documents this as a finding.
